Topic.Title: Removing time limits from Quest games

Posts.EditableText: I posted a game I made in Quest to UKtextadventures and apparently it keeps timing out for players.  Everyone is acting like I put an intentional time limit in the game, so I assume that they must be a way to set it so that there isn't a time limit? I haven't been able to find anything in the Quest interface about setting (or removing) time limits, so does anyone know how to remove that? Thanks!
Posts.HTML: I posted a game I made in Quest to UKtextadventures and apparently it keeps timing out for players. Everyone is acting like I put an intentional time limit in the game, so I assume that they must be a way to set it so that there isn't a time limit? I haven't been able to find anything in the Quest interface about setting (or removing) time limits, so does anyone know how to remove that? Thanks!
